title: MBMBaM 547: Chili Wonka
description:
A decision for the ages arrives with little fanfare. A benign Yahoo Answer spawns a flashpoint that will divide and define a generation. The bath is now soup; this much is unavoidable. What you do with this revelation is entirely in your hands. 

Suggested talking points: McElbucks, A Light Dusting of Power Tool Talk, Dad’s Sad Jams, Watch the Arches, It’s Really a Kadoozie (feat. special guestpert Krystina Arielle), Soup Bath 

Ways to support Black Lives Matter and find anti-racism resources: https://linktr.ee/blacklivesmatter
author: shows@mbmbam.com (Justin McElroy, Griffin McElroy, Travis McElroy)
